title: Best Web Application Award
description: Received the Best Web Application award for developing an innovative e-commerce platform with advanced features and exceptional user experience.

title: Open Source Contributor
description: Recognized as a top contributor to several open-source projects, with over 200 contributions and 5 major feature implementations.

title: Hackathon Winner
description: Led a team of 4 developers to win first place in a 48-hour hackathon, building a real-time disaster response coordination application.

title: Certified Web Developer
description: Earned advanced certification in full-stack web development with a perfect score on the practical assessment.
